original: @241b # // rgya gar skad du /

analyzed: bod skad du /

analyzed: yang dag ye shes snang bar ldan //

analyzed: rtag tu sems can don byed pa //

analyzed: de bzhin yon tan yang dag ldan //

analyzed: 'jig rten gsum mgon phyag 'tshal nas //

original: rab rib kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
analyzed: rab rib kyis ni mi shes pa'i //

original: de yi gti mug sel byed pa //
analyzed: de yi gti mug sel byed pa //

analyzed: yang dag bsams la yang dag dgrol //

analyzed: bdag gis 'bum 'grel bshad par bya //

analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni //

analyzed: 'di skad ces bya ba ni sgro skur dang bral ba'o //

analyzed: bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni kun dga' bas so //

analyzed: grogs med dam zhe na /

analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu thos pa'o //

analyzed: su la thos na bcom ldan 'das la'o //

analyzed: gang thos na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i mdo 'di thos pa'o //

original: sus thos na kun dga' bos thos pa'o //
analyzed: sus thos na kun dga' bos thos pa'o //

analyzed: dus gcig na zhes bya ba'i sgra ni don gnyis la 'jug ste /

analyzed: sdud pa po shes rab che bar go ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'byung bar dkon pa'i don to //

original: ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: bcom pa ni bzhi bcom /

original: bzhi ni dgra ste dgra ni bdud bzhi'o //
analyzed: bzhi ni dgra ste dgra ni bdud bzhi'o //

analyzed: bdud bzhi ni phung po'i bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud dang / lha'i bu'i bdud do //

original: gang gi dus na bcom zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi dus na bcom zhe na /

original: rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus na'o //

original: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Endowed means

analyzed: skal ba dang ldan bas bcom ldan 'das so //

original: 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //

original: 'das pa ni gang gi dus she na /
analyzed: 'das pa ni gang gi dus she na /
translated: When is the past?

original: dpyid zla ra ba'i gnam stong gi nub mo'o //
analyzed: dpyid zla ra ba'i gnam stong gi nub mo'o //

analyzed: 'dam bu'i khrod na gzigs pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te zhes pa ni /
translated: Dwelling in the abode seen in the midst of the reeds means

analyzed: @242a * // phyogs re re la dpag tshad lnga lnga yod pa gru bzhi pa /

analyzed: nang gi ka ba brgyad dang / phyi'i ka ba brgyad kyis brgyan pa /

analyzed: sgo re re la seng ge gnyis gnyis kyis brgyan pa ste /

analyzed: ka rten ni ma ra ka ta ljang gu'o // ka zhu ni aindra n'i la ste /

original: ka ba ni gser las byas pa ste /
analyzed: ka ba ni gser las byas pa ste /

analyzed: 'phra ni byu ru la sogs bas byas pa'o //

original: de bzhin du gdung yang gser las byas pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du gdung yang gser las byas pa ste /

original: phyam la sogs pa ni dngul las byas pa'o //
analyzed: phyam la sogs pa ni dngul las byas pa'o //

analyzed: rtsig pa ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa /

analyzed: phyi logs dang nang logs gnyis ka ri mo mkhas pas bris pa bzhin du snang ba'o //

analyzed: ra ba ni bee d'urya las byas pa'o //

original: sgo bzhi ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa /
analyzed: sgo bzhi ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa /

analyzed: de yang gser dang / dngul dang / aandri n'i la dang / ma ra ka ta dang / padma r'a ga dang / bee d'urya dang / shel dang bdun no //

analyzed: seng ge brgyad kyang rgyu shel las byas shing /

analyzed: gnya' ral la sogs pa ni aandri n'i la dang / byu ru las byas pa'o //

analyzed: mig dang kha ni aandri n'i la dang padma r'a gas mdzes shing /

analyzed: rgya phibs kyi rten ni rin po che sna bdun las byas shing sna tshogs kyi gzugs su snang ba'o //

original: dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pas brgyan zhing /
analyzed: dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pas brgyan zhing /

analyzed: gdugs dang ba dan dang rgyal mtshan gyis phyogs phyogs su brgyan zhing /

original: rin po che la sogs pa mar la 'phyang zhing /
analyzed: rin po che la sogs pa mar la 'phyang zhing /

analyzed: dril bu dang / dril bu g-yer ka dang / rlung gis btab pas skad sna tshogs 'byung ste ;

analyzed: dper na rol mo mkhas pas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i rol mo byas pas skad sna tshogs 'byung ba bzhin no //

analyzed: skyed mos @242b tshal re re la yang rdzing bu re re yod pa'o //

analyzed: skyed mos tshal de'i ming yang /

analyzed: dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / kun du dga' ba dang / rnam par dga' ba dang / rnam pa bzhi yin no //

analyzed: de bzhin du rdzing bu'i ming yang yin no //

analyzed: logs dang / skas ka ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'o //

analyzed: rdzing bu de'i chu yang shel chags pa bzhin du dangs la gsal ba /

original: 'thungs na yang ba /
analyzed: 'thungs na yang ba /

original: lta na yid du 'ong ba /
analyzed: lta na yid du 'ong ba /

analyzed: tsandan dang / ga pur la sogs pa dri dang ldan pa /

analyzed: rdzing bu de'i nang na rang bzhin gyis chu las skyes pa'i me tog sna tshogs yod de /

analyzed: de bzhin du kha dog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /

analyzed: rdzing bu de'i nang na bya'i tshogs sna tshogs yod de /

analyzed: shing de'i me tog dang 'bras bus kyang sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs shing bde bar gnas pa'o //

analyzed: skyed mos tshal dang / rdzing bu la yang /

analyzed: rdo rjes la padma sna tshogs dang bcas pa /

analyzed: rdo rje rin po che'i sa ya sna bdun dang bcas pa ;

analyzed: klu'i zhags pa bya khyud tva ra nas khar bcug pa'o //

analyzed: srung ba / mantra'i rang bzhin /

analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyang sgyu ma lta bu'o //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las /

analyzed: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu /

original: sgyu ma lta bu ste /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu ste /
translated: They are like an illusion.

original: sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun yang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun yang /

original: rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: are like a dream. They are like an illusion.”

analyzed: yang na sngags ni thams cad la khyab ste sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin gyis sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o //

original: rjes su 'dzin pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyas btab ste /
analyzed: rjes su 'dzin pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyas btab ste /
translated: “To take care of” means to seal with the vidyā-mantra.

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dgra bcom pa dang / lha dang / mi la sogs pa rjes su 'dzin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dgra bcom pa dang / lha dang / mi la sogs pa rjes su 'dzin te /

original: de'i ye shes kyi lam gyis /
analyzed: de'i ye shes kyi lam gyis /
translated: Through the path of that gnosis,

original: thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i 'bras bu thob ba'o //
analyzed: thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i 'bras bu thob ba'o //

analyzed: rig sngags 'di ni yang dag pa'i ye shes yin no //

analyzed: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni /

original: bsam gyis @260b mi khyab pa /
analyzed: bsam gyis @260b mi khyab pa /
translated: It is inconceivable.

analyzed: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mar me mdzad la sogs pa sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa'o //

original: rjes su yi rang ste 'di'i lam nas sangs rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su yi rang ste 'di'i lam nas sangs rgyas pa'o //

analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: ma 'ongs pa rnams ni bcom ldan 'das byams ba la sogs pa yin te /

analyzed: de bzhin du de'i lam nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'o //

original: da ltar byung ba na yang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba na yang 'di lta ste /

translated: I myself now explain it for the sake of benefiting the very enlightenment of the Buddhas.

analyzed: smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'di'i tshe 'di la sems can gyi don la / sh'akya seng ges kyang gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ste /

analyzed: 'di'i lam yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'o //

original: rig sngags kyi nges tshig gi rtags dang po rdzogs so /
analyzed: rig sngags kyi nges tshig gi rtags dang po rdzogs so /

analyzed: // / de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pas gsungs pa'i de nas so //
translated: Then, means after the past, future, and present [teachings].

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di zung shig ces gsungs nas /

analyzed: kun dga' bo la bcom ldan 'das kyis gtad pa'o //

analyzed: kun dga' bo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma 'di zung shig ces bya ba ni /

analyzed: sku gsum gyi rang bzhin la sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa gsang sngags kyi tshig gis /

analyzed: ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal te /

original: srid pa gsum yang 'joms pa /
analyzed: srid pa gsum yang 'joms pa /

analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyis bzung nas sems can rnams kyi don mdzad do zhes pa'o //

analyzed: tshongs shig / lhogs shig / shod cig / kun chub par gyis shig ces bya ba ni /

analyzed: nga'i bka' las ma 'das par byas shing /

analyzed: gsungs shig rjes su yi rang zhing sems can thams cad la ston cig ces bya ba'o //

original: yang nad @261a * //

analyzed: 'di lta ste /

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di nyid la phan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di nyid la phan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to benefit this very enlightenment of the Buddha,

original: da lta rang nyid kyis bshad do zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba rigs drug gi don la sprul pa'i skus khyab ste /
analyzed: da lta rang nyid kyis bshad do zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba rigs drug gi don la sprul pa'i skus khyab ste /
translated: Now, I myself will explain means that the nirmāṇakāya pervades the meaning of the six classes of migrating beings.

original: mi bde ba bde bar byed pa'i phyir da ltar byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsam gyis mi khyab ba gsungs pa'o ;
analyzed: mi bde ba bde bar byed pa'i phyir da ltar byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsam gyis mi khyab ba gsungs pa'o ;
translated: Because it makes the unhappy happy, it is the inconceivable queen of awareness mantras that are taught for the purpose of attaining enlightenment in the present.

original: / ngas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: / ngas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: I means

original: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas sems can rnams bsrung bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas sems can rnams bsrung bar byas pa'o //
translated: that Bhagavān Śākyamuni protects sentient beings.

original: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa 'di'i ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa 'di'i ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The name of this queen of awareness mantras, this great secret mantra that protects, is Hold on to this!

original: sems can thams cad dang bdag ces bya ba srung bar @262a * //🔽byed do // rig sngags 'di 'chang zhing gus par byed pa gang yin pa la /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dang bdag ces bya ba srung bar @262a * // byed do // rig sngags 'di 'chang zhing gus par byed pa gang yin pa la /
translated: It is said, I will protect all sentient beings and myself.

original: tshe 'di la yang srung ste /
analyzed: tshe 'di la yang srung ste /
translated: Whoever holds and respects this awareness mantra will be protected in this life.

original: de bzhin du tshe phyi ma la yang yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshe phyi ma la yang yin no //
translated: Likewise, it is also for the next life.

original: mtshams bcad do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mtshams bcad do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: I will establish boundaries means🔽that the boundaries of the maṇḍala are established.

original: mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / ma rungs pa'i nad byung na /
analyzed: mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / ma rungs pa'i nad byung na /
translated: If there are human illnesses, cattle diseases, or unwholesome diseases,

original: yul 'khor mtshams gcad par bya ste /
analyzed: yul 'khor mtshams gcad par bya ste /
translated: one should block the borders of the country.

original: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis seng ldeng gi phur pa la bris nas /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis seng ldeng gi phur pa la bris nas /
translated: Having written with the root mantra on a kīla of cutch wood,

original: phyogs mtshams su btags te /
analyzed: phyogs mtshams su btags te /
translated: one should tie it to the borders.

original: dbus su gcig gdab pa'o //
analyzed: dbus su gcig gdab pa'o //
translated: One should plant one in the center.

original: tshon skud sna tshogs kyis bskor zhing /
analyzed: tshon skud sna tshogs kyis bskor zhing /
translated: One should surround it with various colored threads.

original: rgyal bas gsungs pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor yang dag par bzhengs te /
analyzed: rgyal bas gsungs pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor yang dag par bzhengs te /
translated: Having erected the maṇḍala correctly according to the Victor’s teachings,

original: de bzhin du phyogs mtshams su gang ba'i bum pa bzhag nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du phyogs mtshams su gang ba'i bum pa bzhag nas /
translated: one should place vases filled with water in the directions and borders,

original: chu de yang rigs kyi bu pho'am /
analyzed: chu de yang rigs kyi bu pho'am /
translated: and that water should be sprinkled by the sons of good family,

original: rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pas gtor bar bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pas gtor bar bya'o //
translated: the daughters of good family, and so forth.

original: de bzhin du byas na phyugs nad dang / mi nad dang / ma rungs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du byas na phyugs nad dang / mi nad dang / ma rungs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one acts in that way, all cattle diseases, human illnesses, and unwholesome diseases will be pacified.

original: sngon byung ba rnams kyang phyir 'byung ste /
analyzed: sngon byung ba rnams kyang phyir 'byung ste /
translated: Even those that have occurred previously will be expelled.

original: phyi nas 'ong ba rnams kyis mi tshugs so //
analyzed: phyi nas 'ong ba rnams kyis mi tshugs so //
translated: Those that will come later will not be able to come.

original: shar phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams gcad do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: shar phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams gcad do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase one should establish the boundary up to one krośa in the east

original: ring na rgyang grags gcig tshun chad du mtshams gcad do //
analyzed: ring na rgyang grags gcig tshun chad du mtshams gcad do //
translated: means that the boundary should be established up to one krośa at the most.

original: gal te phyed tshun chad do //
analyzed: gal te phyed tshun chad do //
translated: If it is less than that, it is fine.

original: tha ma la rang gi yul 'khor tsam mo //
analyzed: tha ma la rang gi yul 'khor tsam mo //
translated: In the case of the least, it is just one's own country.

original: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyi bar du yang rgyang grags gcig mtshams gcad do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyi bar du yang rgyang grags gcig mtshams gcad do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase one should establish the boundary up to one krośa in all directions and intermediate directions

original: sngar bshad pa'i rdzas dang / sngags kyis kyang mtshams gcad par bya ste /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i rdzas dang / sngags kyis kyang mtshams gcad par bya ste /
translated: means that one should establish the boundary with the substances and mantras explained above.

original: de bzhin du phyogs dang mtshams kyang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du phyogs dang mtshams kyang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand the directions and intermediate directions in the same way.

original: de bzhin du byas par gyur na /
analyzed: de bzhin du byas par gyur na /
translated: If one does it in that way,

original: yul de bkra shis par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yul de bkra shis par 'gyur te /
translated: that place will be auspicious.

original: nad rnams kyis mi tshugs shing /
analyzed: nad rnams kyis mi tshugs shing /
translated: Diseases will not strike,

original: lo legs te ser ba la sogs pas kyang mi tshugs so //
analyzed: lo legs te ser ba la sogs pas kyang mi tshugs so //
translated: and even hail and so forth will not strike.

original: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa padma'i rigs kyi rin po che'i rigs ma /
analyzed: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa padma'i rigs kyi rin po che'i rigs ma /
translated: The Queen of Knowledge-Mantra, the Holder of the Subsequent Mantra, the Jewel Family of the Lotus Family,

original: mtshon pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes /
analyzed: mtshon pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes /
translated: The symbol is the wisdom of equality.

original: mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo /
analyzed: mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo /
translated: The symbol-possessor is the queen of knowledge mantras.

original: phung po ni tshor pa'i phung po /
analyzed: phung po ni tshor pa'i phung po /
translated: The aggregate is the aggregate of feeling.

original: chu'i khams sna'i skye mched do //
analyzed: chu'i khams sna'i skye mched do //
translated: The water element is the nose sense-sphere.

original: ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can /
analyzed: ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can /
translated: She has the nature of the five wisdoms and is crowned with the five buddhas.

original: spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: spyan gsum pa /
translated: She has three eyes.

original: sku mdog ser mo /
analyzed: sku mdog ser mo /
translated: Her body is yellow.

original: zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
analyzed: zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
translated: She has three faces and six arms.

original: zhal g-yas dkar po g-yon dmar po /
analyzed: zhal g-yas dkar po g-yon dmar po /
translated: Her right face is white, the left is red.

original: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: She is adorned with all ornaments.

original: phyag dang po g-yas g-yon gnyis @262b kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa /
analyzed: phyag dang po g-yas g-yon gnyis @262b kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa /
translated: Her first right and left hands draw a bow and arrow.

original: bar ma na rin po che tha ma na be con no //
analyzed: bar ma na rin po che tha ma na be con no //
translated: The middle ones hold a jewel and a club.

original: g-yon pa'i bar ma na dgra sta /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i bar ma na dgra sta /
translated: The middle left holds a sword.

original: tha ma na zhags pa'o //🔽zhabs g-yas brkyang ba /
analyzed: tha ma na zhags pa'o // zhabs g-yas brkyang ba /
translated: The last holds a lasso.🔽Her right leg is extended.

original: g-yon bskum pa /
analyzed: g-yon bskum pa /
translated: The left is bent.

original: padma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa /🔽gzhon nu'i cha byad can /
analyzed: padma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa / gzhon nu'i cha byad can /
translated: On a lotus, moon seat, with the light of the sun,🔽she has the form of a maiden.

original: sgeg pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sgeg pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'o //
translated: She has a playful manner.

original: rig sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rig sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The knowledge mantra words are as follows:

original: sa mu tsa /
analyzed: sa mu tsa /
translated: samucchanda

original: bi mu tsa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bi mu tsa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Vimucya, and so forth.

original: kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Ānanda, thus have I heard:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One has spoken again and again.

original: yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gsang sngags kyi stobs dang / mthu rtsal dang ldan pa 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni /🔽yul 'khor mtshams gcod pa dang / nad rnams bcom pa dang / 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya'i bar du yang /
analyzed: yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gsang sngags kyi stobs dang / mthu rtsal dang ldan pa 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni / yul 'khor mtshams gcod pa dang / nad rnams bcom pa dang / 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya'i bar du yang /
translated: These powerful and mighty mantras, practiced for a long time, are:

original: yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ro //
translated: They protect the borders of the country, conquer diseases, and protect, guard, pacify, and bring well-being for up to five hundred yojanas.

original: rig sngags 'di 'dzin pa gang yang /
analyzed: rig sngags 'di 'dzin pa gang yang /
translated: Whoever upholds this knowledge mantra

original: tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma yang bde ba thob cing yang dag pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma yang bde ba thob cing yang dag pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: will attain happiness in this life and the next, and will attain true wisdom.

original: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It has also been spoken by the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Perfectly Awakened Ones of the past.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa nyi ma phyag mtshan dang / tshe dpag med dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rgya mtsho rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa nyi ma phyag mtshan dang / tshe dpag med dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rgya mtsho rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o //
translated: The Tathagatas, the sun-like teachers, the Akshobhya, the Amitayus, the Samudravajradhara, and so on, as many as the sands of the Ganges, have rejoiced and taught.🔽The Tathagatas, the Arhats, the Perfectly Awakened Ones of the future will also teach.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / rdo rje snying po la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / rdo rje snying po la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o //
translated: In the same way, the Lords of the World, Manjusri, Vajra garbha, and so on, the inconceivable Tathagatas, have rejoiced and taught.

original: da ltar byung ba na yang ngas bshad do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba na yang ngas bshad do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: I also teach in the present.

original: sems can gyi don la sbrul pa'i skus khyab ste /
analyzed: sems can gyi don la sbrul pa'i skus khyab ste /
translated: The emanation bodies pervade for the sake of beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas sems can gyi don la rjes su yi rang zhing yang dag par gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas sems can gyi don la rjes su yi rang zhing yang dag par gsungs pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One, Śākyamuni, rejoiced in the welfare of sentient beings and spoke correctly.

original: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs bas kyang bshad do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs bas kyang bshad do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Brahmā, lord of the Sahā world, also explained.

original: rig sngags 'di'i lam nas tshangs pa'i ngo bo thob cing /
analyzed: rig sngags 'di'i lam nas tshangs pa'i ngo bo thob cing /
translated: Through the path of this knowledge mantra, one attains the state of Brahmā.

original: gus pas mchod par byas te /🔽tshangs pas kyang rjes su yi rang @263a * //
analyzed: gus pas mchod par byas te / tshangs pas kyang rjes su yi rang @263a * //
translated: With devotion, one makes offerings.

original: zhing gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhing gsungs pa'o //
translated: Brahmā also rejoiced and spoke.

original: kun dga' bo /🔽dge slod  ngam /
analyzed: kun dga' bo / dge slod  ngam /
translated: Ānanda,

original: dge slong ma'am /
analyzed: dge slong ma'am /
translated: whether a monk,🔽nun,

original: dge bsnyen nam /
analyzed: dge bsnyen nam /
translated: layman,

original: dge bsnyen ma gang la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa 'di bzung nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma gang la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa 'di bzung nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: or laywoman, whoever upholds this queen of knowledge mantras, this great secret mantra,

original: rig sngags 'di bzung na ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob ste /
analyzed: rig sngags 'di bzung na ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob ste /
translated: if one upholds this knowledge mantra, one attains the ten perfections.

original: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The ten perfections are generosity, morality, patience, effort, meditation, wisdom, skillful means, power, aspiration, and knowledge.

original: de bzhin du 'di'i lam nas sa bcu'i byang chub thob pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di'i lam nas sa bcu'i byang chub thob pa'o //
translated: In the same way, one attains the ten bodhisattva stages through this path.

original: ji ltar bstan pa dang / ji ltar kun chub par byas pa bzhin du shes sam zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ji ltar bstan pa dang / ji ltar kun chub par byas pa bzhin du shes sam zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Do you understand it as it is taught and as it is comprehended?

original: mi 'gyur ba rdo rje bzhin du brtan te /
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba rdo rje bzhin du brtan te /
translated: It is unchanging, firm like a vajra.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab cing /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab cing /
translated: It is inconceivable.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bzhin du sems can la khyab pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bzhin du sems can la khyab pa'o //
translated: It pervades sentient beings like the wisdom of equality.

original: nam mkha' bzhin du kun la khyab ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du kun la khyab ste /
translated: It pervades all like space.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la yang ma lus par chos kyis khyab pa'o //🔽ye shes kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la yang ma lus par chos kyis khyab pa'o // ye shes kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs te /
translated: It pervades all world systems without exception with the Dharma.🔽It is seen with the eye of wisdom.

original: de bltas ba'i phyir na shes par grags pa'o //
analyzed: de bltas ba'i phyir na shes par grags pa'o //
translated: It is known because it is seen.

original: mthong ngam las byed pa de la ni ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar byas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mthong ngam las byed pa de la ni ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar byas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: And to the one who performs the rite, it is said, For as long as he lives, he will be protected, guarded, and watched over, and will have peace and well-being.

original: ye shes med par ye shes thob cing /
analyzed: ye shes med par ye shes thob cing /
translated: This shows how, without wisdom, one attains wisdom,

original: dper na mun pa'i nang na me mar btang ba bzhin du bstan te /
analyzed: dper na mun pa'i nang na me mar btang ba bzhin du bstan te /
translated: like a lamp lit in the darkness.

original: yang dag pa'i ye shes thob cing 'jig rten 'di yang bsrung zhing skyob ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ye shes thob cing 'jig rten 'di yang bsrung zhing skyob ste /
translated: Having attained true wisdom, one protects and guards this world,

original: shing ljon pa nyi ma shar ba'i dus su sems can der song ba rnams bsil bar byed de /
analyzed: shing ljon pa nyi ma shar ba'i dus su sems can der song ba rnams bsil bar byed de /
translated: like a tree that, when the sun rises, provides shade for the beings who approach it.

original: ji srid ma shi'i bar du /
analyzed: ji srid ma shi'i bar du /
translated: For as long as one lives,

original: nad dang 'bral zhing dpal dang ldan te /
analyzed: nad dang 'bral zhing dpal dang ldan te /
translated: one is free from illness and endowed with glory,

original: mya ngan la sogs pa bor zhing bde ba la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan la sogs pa bor zhing bde ba la gnas pa'o //
translated: having cast off sorrow and so forth, and abides in happiness.

original: de bzhin du tshe phyi ma la yang chos 'di dran zhing bde bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshe phyi ma la yang chos 'di dran zhing bde bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, in future lives, one will remember this Dharma and be happy.

original: kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Ananda, it says,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One has spoken.

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The past, future, and present Blessed Buddhas have spoken means

original: mar me mdzad dang / byams pa dang / sh'akya thub pa la sogs pas kyang gsungs te /
analyzed: mar me mdzad dang / byams pa dang / sh'akya thub pa la sogs pas kyang gsungs te /
translated: Dīpaṃkara, Maitreya, Śākyamuni, and so forth have also taught this.

original: rjes su yi rang zhing rig @263b sngags kyis rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su yi rang zhing rig @263b sngags kyis rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: They rejoice in it and have sealed it with the vidyā mantra.

original: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma 'dis ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma 'dis ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By this queen of vidyā mantras, this great dhāraṇī mantra, I will protect the one named so-and-so.

original: gang zag dang / sems can thams cad dang / 'di 'dzin par byed pa gang yang rung ba la /

original: mtho ris su btang nas bzung ba'o //
analyzed: mtho ris su btang nas bzung ba'o //

original: zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
